## The R-package DT

- [DT: An R interface to the DataTables library](https://rstudio.github.io/DT/)

```{r}
# install.packages('DT')
library('DT')
```

```{r}
exdat <- read.csv("data/exdat.csv")
```

```{r}
datatable(exdat)
```
